net.cloud.server

Class ConfigConstants

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.cloud.server.ConfigConstants

  • public class ConfigConstants
extends Object
    I cba to load these things from a file, but having them all in one class is convenient enough.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int LOG_CYCLE_TIME

    • Field Detail

      • LOGGING_ENABLED

        public static final boolean LOGGING_ENABLED
        Determines if log files will be created. No matter what this service will run, but if this flag is true, logging will be sent to both SYS_OUT and a log file. If it is false, the output will only go to SYS_OUT.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • VERBOSE_EXCEPTIONS

        public static final boolean VERBOSE_EXCEPTIONS
        Flag indicating whether or not to be verbose about exceptions that are logged. This just means the message and stack trace will be displayed to standard out rather than just the message
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • STATS_TO_CONSOLE

        public static final boolean STATS_TO_CONSOLE
        Whether or not server stats will be shown to the console
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        public static final int LOG_CYCLE_TIME
        Amount of time in milliseconds between each save of queued log reports

        public static final int THREAD_POOL_SIZE
        Number of threads the task engine will have available for running tasks

        public static final int STAT_TASK_INTERVAL
